channel.title: How to change starter when you login?
channel.description: I have devolution 7 source and I wanna know how I can change autologin starter weapon from Bronze long and wooden shield to a better starter. Any help is apreciated :)

item.title: How to change starter when you login?
item.dc:creator: @ashley001 ashley001
item.description:
@ashley001 wrote:

go to player.java. serch for:
// Giving the player an unique look
should look like this:

// Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=-1; playerEquipment[playerCape]=6568; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=14523; playerEquipment[playerShield]=-1; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=14524; playerEquipment[playerHands]=-1; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=15352; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4587;
then get the codes u want and change the old 1s for the new 1s :)

Read full topic
item.source: How to change starter when you login?
